title: Calories in Coors Light
meta_description: Learn the calories in Coors Light per 12 oz serving, plus carbs, protein, sodium, full nutrition breakdown, and serving tweaks for better tracking.
assumptions: Standard 12 fl oz (355 ml) can or bottle of Coors Light lager beer, 4.2% ABV, no added mixers.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by batch, exact serving size, temperature, and any customizations. Values based on manufacturer and USDA data; check labels for precision.

quick_answer.text: One 12 oz serving of Coors Light provides 102 calories, 5 g carbs, and 0.9 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Switch to regular Coors Banquet per serving
Add 1 oz fresh lime juice mixer

faqs.q: How many calories in one Coors Light?
faqs.a: 102 calories in a standard 12 oz serving of Coors Light.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in Coors Light?
faqs.a: About 5 grams of carbohydrates per 12 oz serving, with 0 g fiber.
Yes, approximately 0.9 grams of protein per 12 oz serving.

faqs.q: How much sodium is in Coors Light?
faqs.a: Only 10 mg of sodium per 12 oz serving.

faqs.q: Calories in Coors Light compared to other light beers?
faqs.a: Coors Light has 102 kcal per 12 oz; similar to Michelob Ultra (95 kcal) but lower than Bud Light (110 kcal).
